Articles.Content:
Wish I was

TUBM is actually a mod.

I'm working on a mod.

TUBM Is not listening to the KSP music.

God dang it! I have a KSP video with the music playing!

TUBM gave me rep once.

Did I? Someone tell me if I did, I can't remember.

Do you play Trombone by any chance?

Whatever that is.

TUBM played or plays FPS games.

Nope, never.

TUBM Plays or has played super paper Mario.

Yes!

TUBM likes tortilla chips.

I have, and I loved it! This is gonna sound weird, but I enjoyed The Pit Of 100 Trials.

The user below me wanted to reply to that instead.

EDIT: Or I can be full of it and overdose with irony.

Plot Twist! I did!

TUBM edited his last post.

I did! You'll find out why in a minute.

Don't you dare skip ahead of me. I don't want the first line to be true.

EDIT: Okay, good. Wait, no I lied! Or did I tell the truth?

Stop messing with my head!

TUBM is mad that I skipped him.

No, I wasn't skipped.

Did the user below me enjoy the flopside pit of 100 trials?

No! But I did enjoy the Flipside pit of 100 trials (I never actually even went into the Flopside pit)

TUBM is male.

Edited July 19, 2015 by NeatCrown
Yes, the person below me can act quite impishly

Nope. I have no idea what you're talking about.

I bet you do, Mr. "Below thyself"

what? pishy? what?

The user below me does not play 1.0.4.

true not yet ; ) but you know after 200 000 000s (stopped counting) << /played it's not like i really need to play a game in real time to enjoy it or support it ; )

the ubm like fishing quietly ; )

I don't. In fact, I hate quiet places. I've seen quite a lot of bad things happen in my job and whenever I stop in quiet, it all falls down on me. Funnily enough, stress keeps me happy.

The user below me has a job.

True if you call going back to school and taking care of the house and kids a job (which it is really).

TUBM is a chief competitor in building really fast jet planes and awesome jet plane challenges.

I wish

TUBM has completed 3 challenges.

yup i completed small trees challenges and had 50% better and more interesting result than some mass industrial lobbies in this sector. Sadly thoose results are biased as it was feeling interpretation and that i was missing some precise measurement tools to clearly isolate each molecules ; ) plus feeling interpretation is a total non-valuable data in science history and i totatlly miss some ; )

Sad isn't it ? could have been usefull ; )

tubm dunno what i mean ; )

( "on the other hand i also used to work a litl' time in the "national school of physics chemestry biology" teacher staff side ... (water retreatment quality, aggro industry qualities) ) also notice thoose two departement are located in the building basement and basement side with a third one ; ) others dep are top of them ; ) fun architecturaly speaking isn't it ? )

Edited July 19, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
i need to reach a sky crap ... ask we'll see ...

Noooo... i do not.

The user below me doesnt know me, nor did expect my revival.

I never knew you ever. You're a complete stranger to me.

TUBM is over the age of 20.

That is true. But,

TUBM won't look nearly as good as I do at my age.

Insufficient Input

The user below me likes Star Trek.
